# clibrary example

Build on Linux:

```sh
cmake --preset linux
cmake --build --preset linux --target install
cjpm run
```

Build on MacOS:

```sh
cmake --preset macos
cmake --build --preset macos --target install
cjpm run
```


Build on Windows:

```sh
cmake --preset windows
cmake --build --preset windows --target install
cjpm run
```
